frontmatter.title: Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage
frontmatter.desc: A novel about Tsukuru Tazaki, a man who at 36 is still haunted by his sudden rejection by his four closest friends when he was 20. He embarks on a journey to discover the truth behind this rejection and to come to terms with his past, exploring themes of identity, belonging, friendship, and the search for meaning.
